title: MSB3644 says .NETFramework version 5
body:
### Issue Description
When attempting to use `dotnet build` on a .NET 5 project when the SDK is not present it shows a weird error message with terminology that isn't branding correct:

```
error MSB3644: The reference assemblies for .NETFramework,Version=v5.0 were not found.
```
Observe `.NETFramework,Version=v5.0`

I would not expect this to say '.NETFramework'

nodes.body: We started working on this issue as #5826 before we saw this one, sorry.
